props.name: icon
props.docblock: Docstring for the icon prop... Icon that will be shown in the alert

description.text: Docstring for the icon prop... Icon that will be shown in the alert

props.name: dismissible
props.docblock: Whether the alert is dismissible. Defaults to true.

description.text: Whether the alert is dismissible. Defaults to true.

props.name: onClose
props.docblock: Optional callback function for when the alert it dismissed.

description.text: Optional callback function for when the alert it dismissed.

props.name: actions
props.docblock: Optional list of action elements. May include, at most, 2 actions, or 1 if dismissible is true.

description.text: Optional list of action elements. May include, at most, 2 actions, or 1 if dismissible is true.

props.name: stacked
props.docblock: Position of the dismiss and call-to-action buttons. Defaults to ``false``.

description.text: Position of the dismiss and call-to-action buttons. Defaults to ``false``.

props.name: closeLabel
props.docblock: Sets the text for alert close button, defaults to 'Dismiss'.

description.text: Sets the text for alert close button, defaults to 'Dismiss'.

props.name: bsPrefix
props.docblock: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name

description.text: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name

props.name: bsPrefix
props.docblock: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name

description.text: Overrides underlying component base CSS class name
